tool_description: Evaluates orders against predefined risk limits including position limits, concentration limits, and maximum order sizes before execution.

price.description: Order price for notional value calculation

current_position.description: Current position in the symbol (positive for long, negative for short)

account_equity.description: Total account equity for percentage-based limits

max_position_size.description: Maximum allowed position size for this symbol

max_order_value.description: Maximum allowed notional value per order

max_concentration_pct.description: Maximum concentration percentage of account equity in single symbol

error_messages: Position limit exceeded: Order would exceed maximum position size limit.
Order value too large: Order notional value exceeds maximum order value limit.
Concentration limit exceeded: Order would exceed maximum concentration percentage.
Insufficient account equity: Account equity too low for risk calculations.
Invalid risk parameters: Risk limit parameters must be positive values.
Price required: Price must be provided for limit orders to calculate notional value.
usage: Provide order details, current position, and account equity along with risk limit parameters. The tool evaluates all risk constraints and returns approval status.

risk_status.description: Risk evaluation result: approved, rejected, or warning

risk_violations.description: List of risk limit violations if any
